body:
Comment 1: 
Nofollow is:
    return this&RECORD_PROP_NOFOLLOW > 0 && !this.Form()
The first clause is true, so it calls Form.  Form is this:
    return this&RECORD_PROP_FORM > 0 && !this.Frame()
The first clause is false (the RECORD_PROP_FROM bit is not set), so Form returns false. 
Since Nofollow returns !this.Form, Nofollow returns true.
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
